name: - Plain -
body:
### Welcome to PLAIN game This is a native Android application, compatible with mobile phones and tablets running Android version 4.0 or newer. It will also run in Android versions as early as 2.3, however the settings in the main menu may not work. This application offers entertainment, education, team participation and also records the search strategy choices made by children users. Particular attention is paid to choices made by children with special education requirements, the data from which may be shared with scientists specialising in this field. Transfer of such data is anonymous and subject to consent provided by the children's parents or guardians. Such large scale data gathering is needed in order to help support further development and improvement of biomedical engineering research, specifically pattern recognition, early warning and education support algorithms for children with special education requirements. ### PLAIN Team The team consist of 6 members and it is getting bigger... At the moment the members are:
1. **Dr. Alexandros Astaras** - Physicist, Engineer, Biomedical Engineer
2. **Dr. Andromachi Nanou** - Special Education Teacher, Pedagogue (President of Non Governmental Organisation [INCLUDE](http://include-edu.blogspot.gr/))
3. **Apostolos Siokas** - Computer Scientist (@solotsopa)
4. **Alkistis Karouli** - Designer, Artist
5. **Julia Sason** - Special Education Teacher
6. **Spyros Mavroforos** - Programmer
### Design and Code All together worked as team in order to produce this special game. The drawings are all painted by Alkistis Karouli and the code is written by Apostolos Siokas. ### Expectations We focuses on the children with special education requirements and we expect that our game will increase the education level of the children, easier and with more fun than the normal way. We are going to produce games like that for more cities in order for more children to be able to play PLAIN game. ### Download Android version From here you can download the .apk file in order to install it in your **Android** device (laptop, tablet or mobile phone)
